name: Martin Clark Consultancy
membership: Member of the Advocacy Hub. An informal association of independent consultants specialising in advocacy, campaigning and social and political change strategies for civil society. http://www.theadvocacyhub.org/
goal: Support to non-governmental organisations campaigning for human rights, development, and the environment.
interests: Borders and Security, Climate Action, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives:
- Development Assistance
- Fisheries policy including implementation of the CFP
